participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and family-oriented, with a love for adventure and storytelling.
participant_1.background: i walk three miles every day. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love to spend time with my family. i am a baby delivery nurse.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, always looking for new experiences and connections.
participant_2.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i met taylor swift. i have short brown hair. i am a convenience store manager.
